name: Funny Fair
description:
"Funny Fair" is a Hypercasual mobile game with a semi-realistic 3D art style.

The gameplay core is very simple, the player has to knockdown all the cans and throw the ball into a bucket.

Developed by Wildcards:

Producer:

  • Raoul Seresse

Game Designer and UI Artist:

  • Alexandra Hahn

3D Artists:

  • Jonas Kleefeld
  • Christopher Helmig

Programmer:

  • Gasaini Gasainiev
